Title: THIS WILL BE ABSURD SVEN GUIDE

ItemTooltips.blink: If your team lacks proper initiation this can help.
ItemTooltips.gauntlets: you have to hands so you need two gauntlets.
ItemTooltips.magic_wand: you'll never be sad getting one of these!
ItemTooltips.power_treads: sven benefits most from these! tread switching helps with mana issues (which you have as sven) and the attack speed is helpful!
ItemTooltips.black_king_bar: You do lots of damage with your ult, so going first item BKB is nice because it allows you to get off your abilities uncontested and do lots of DPS.
ItemTooltips.armlet: Nice build up, good stats, the active allows you to do some cool (or clowny) things.
ItemTooltips.mask_of_madness: The DPS increase you get from this insane, it has good synergy  with your abilities and BKB.
ItemTooltips.ancient_janggo: If you're doing poor in the early game going bracer -> drum can be helpful.
ItemTooltips.abyssal_blade: The stun from this is nice, and so is the bash chance.

AbilityTooltips.sven_storm_bolt: This is one of the best stuns in the game, get and max this first.
AbilityTooltips.sven_great_cleave: Early game, you don't have the damage to make cleave particularly useful, it also pushes the lane.
AbilityTooltips.sven_warcry: The bonus armor is good and the movespeed is great as well, allowing you to chase, escape, etc.
AbilityTooltips.sven_gods_strength: This is what gives you your damage, no reason not to get this at 6/11/16
AbilityTooltips.attribute_bonus: Stats are useful on Sven, but I feel his abilities all should take priority. Getting one point or so over warcry isn't too awful though, as it gives you more mana for stuns.
